en: Narrator: Peppa and George are playing at Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig’s house.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治正在猪奶奶和猪爷爷家玩。

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa, catch.
cn: 佩奇：爷爷，接住。

en: Grandpa Pig: Ho-ho-ho-ho, catch.
cn: 猪爷爷：呵呵呵呵，接住。

en: Grandpa Pig: What’s this?
cn: 猪爷爷：这是什么？

en: George: Dinosaur. Grrr.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。哇呜。

en: Grandpa Pig: A dinosaur? Ho-ho-ho-ho.
cn: 猪爷爷：恐龙？呵呵呵呵。

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa, what are you doing?
cn: 佩奇：爷爷，你在做什么？

examples.en: What are you doing, Daddy?
What are you doing, Mummy?

en: Grandpa Pig: I’m planting these seeds.
cn: 猪爷爷：我在种这些种子。

examples.en: I’m planting these flowers.
I’m planting these vegetables.

en: Peppa Pig: Seeds? What are seeds for?
cn: 佩奇：种子？种子是干什么的？

examples.en: What are flowers for?
What are these tools for?

en: Grandpa Pig: Seeds grow into plants.
cn: 猪爷爷：种子会长成植物。

en: Grandpa Pig: I just dig a little hole and put the seed in. Then I cover it with earth and water it.
cn: 猪爷爷：我只要挖个小洞，把种子放进去，然后盖上土，浇点水。

en: Grandpa Pig: Everything in my garden grows from tiny seeds like these.
cn: 猪爷爷：我花园里的所有东西都是从这样的小种子长出来的。

en: Peppa Pig: Even the big apple tree?
cn: 佩奇：连那棵大苹果树也是吗？

sentence.cn: 连那棵大苹果树也是吗？

examples.en: Even the big peach tree?
Even the big carrot?
examples.cn: 连那根大胡萝卜也是吗？

en: Grandpa Pig: Oh, yes. These tiny seeds will grow into a little apple tree like this.
cn: 猪爷爷：当然。这些小种子会长成像这样的苹果树苗。

en: Peppa and George: Oo-oo-oo.
cn: 佩奇和乔治：哦哦哦。

en: Grandpa Pig: And that little apple tree will grow into a big apple tree like this.
cn: 猪爷爷：然后小苹果树会长成像这样的苹果大树。

en: Grandpa Pig: Ouch!
cn: 猪爷爷：哎哟！

en: Grandpa Pig: And inside this apple are more seeds.
cn: 猪爷爷：这个苹果里面还有更多的种子。

en: Peppa Pig: To make more apple trees.
cn: 佩奇：可以长出更多的苹果树。

en: Grandpa Pig: Exactly.
cn: 猪爷爷：没错。

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa, Grandpa, I want to plant a seed.
cn: 佩奇：爷爷，爷爷，我想种一颗种子。

en: Grandpa Pig: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed?
cn: 猪爷爷：你想种一颗草莓种子吗？

sentence.en: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed?
sentence.cn: 你想种一颗草莓种子吗？

examples.en: Would you like to cook a cake?
Would you like to read a story?

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, please.
cn: 佩奇：好的，谢谢。

en: Grandpa Pig: This seed will grow into a lovely strawberry plant.
cn: 猪爷爷：这颗种子会长成漂亮的草莓苗。

en: Grandpa Pig: I just make a little hole.
cn: 猪爷爷：我先挖个小洞。

en: Peppa Pig: Then I put the seed in and cover it with earth.
cn: 佩奇：然后我把种子放进去，再盖上土。

en: Grandpa Pig: Shall I water it for you?
cn: 猪爷爷：要我帮你浇水吗？

sentence.en: Shall I water it for you?

examples.en: Shall I help you with that?
Shall I carry this for you?

en: Peppa Pig: No, no. I want to water it.
cn: 佩奇：不用不用，我要自己浇。

en: Grandpa Pig: Good. Now we wait for it to grow.
cn: 猪爷爷：好。现在我们等它长大。

sentence.en: Now we wait for it to grow.

examples.en: Now we wait for the cake to bake.
Now we wait for the paint to dry.

en: Narrator: Peppa and George are waiting for the seed to grow.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治正在等种子发芽。

en: Peppa Pig: It’s not doing anything.
cn: 佩奇：它什么都没发生。

en: Grandpa Pig: Ho-ho-ho-ho-ho. You have to be patient, Peppa. It will take a long time to grow.
cn: 猪爷爷：呵呵呵呵呵。要有耐心，佩奇。它要很久才会长大。

points.en: It will take a long time to grow.

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, George, it’s time to go home.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，乔治，该回家了。

examples.en: It’s time to go to bed.
It’s time to eat lunch.

en: Peppa Pig: But we’re waiting for my strawberry plant to grow. I wanted strawberries for tea.
cn: 佩奇：可是我们在等我的草莓苗长大。我想下午茶吃草莓。

examples.en: I wanted ice cream for dessert.
I wanted to play with my toys.

en: Grandpa Pig: Don’t worry, Peppa. Next time you come, the seed will have grown into a plant.
cn: 猪爷爷：别担心，佩奇。下次你来，种子就会长成小苗了。

en: Peppa Pig: And we’ll have strawberries!
cn: 佩奇：我们就能吃到草莓了！

en: Grandpa Pig: Yes.
cn: 猪爷爷：对。

en: Mummy Pig: Come on, Peppa.
cn: 猪妈妈：走吧，佩奇。

en: Peppa Pig: Bye-bye, Grandpa. Bye-bye, strawberry.
cn: 佩奇：再见，爷爷。再见，草莓。

en: Narrator: Grandpa Pig looks after Peppa’s strawberry plant. After many days Grandpa Pig finds a tiny plant growing. Day by day the plant grows bigger and bigger. Then, one day, Grandpa Pig finds something very special.
cn: 旁白：猪爷爷照顾着佩奇的草莓苗。过了很多天，猪爷爷发现小苗长出来了。一天一天，小苗越来越大。终于有一天，猪爷爷发现了特别的东西。

en: Grandpa Pig: Strawberries!
cn: 猪爷爷：草莓！

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa, we’re back.
cn: 佩奇：爷爷，我们回来了。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George have come to play again.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治又来玩了。

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa, Grandpa, did my plant grow?
cn: 佩奇：爷爷，爷爷，我的小苗长大了吗？

en: Grandpa Pig: Yes, look.
cn: 猪爷爷：长大了，你看。

en: Peppa Pig: Strawberries!
cn: 佩奇：草莓！

en: Peppa Pig: Thank you, Grandpa.
cn: 佩奇：谢谢你，爷爷。

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa, can we plant something else?
cn: 佩奇：爷爷，我们还能种别的吗？

examples.en: Can we play something else?
Can we eat something else?

en: Grandpa Pig: Yes, now it’s George’s turn to choose.
cn: 猪爷爷：可以，现在轮到乔治选了。

sentence.en: Now it’s George’s turn to choose.

examples.en: Now it’s Peppa’s turn to choose.
Now it’s Daddy Pig’s turn to choose.

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, you choose, George. Choose...a carrot.
cn: 佩奇：对，乔治你选吧。选……胡萝卜。

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa, I think George wants to grow carrots.
cn: 佩奇：爷爷，我觉得乔治想种胡萝卜。

en: Grandpa Pig: George, would you like to grow a carrot?
cn: 猪爷爷：乔治，你想种胡萝卜吗？

en: George: No.
cn: 乔治：不。

en: Grandpa Pig: What would you like to grow?
cn: 猪爷爷：那你想种什么？

sentence.en: What would you like to grow?

examples.en: What would you like to eat?
What would you like to play?

en: Narrator: George has thought of something he wants to grow.
cn: 旁白：乔治想好了他要种什么。

sentence.en: George has thought of something he wants to grow.
sentence.cn: 乔治想好了他要种什么。

examples.en: Peppa has thought of something she wants to buy.
examples.cn: 佩奇想好了她要买什么。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has thought of something he wants to eat.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸想好了他要吃什么。

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Narrator: George wants to grow a dinosaur tree.
cn: 旁白：乔治想种一棵恐龙树。

en: Peppa Pig: Silly George. Dinosaurs don’t grow on trees.
cn: 佩奇：傻乔治，恐龙不会长在树上。

examples.en: Cars don’t grow on trees.
Toys don’t grow on trees.

en: George: Dinosaur. Grrr.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。哇呜。
